main_definition: A regularly distributed publication containing news, features about a particular subject or area of interest, and advertising matter, usually sent via electronic mail.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Periodical publication with articles on various topics
meanings_and_examples.example: I subscribe to the technology newsletter every month to stay updated on new gadgets.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Electronic version of a traditional print magazine or journal
meanings_and_examples.example: The environmental sustainability newsletter focuses on eco-friendly practices and green living tips.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Promotional material sent by businesses to their customers or potential customers
meanings_and_examples.example: I received a gardening newsletter from the local nursery promoting upcoming sales events.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A communication tool used by organizations to inform members about ongoing activities and updates
meanings_and_examples.example: The alumni association sends out a school newsletter every quarter, highlighting achievements of former students.
